admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The project includes: (a) the
            construction and improvement of 10 national road sections
            totalling about 500 km and 16 sections of minor roads
            totalling about 230 km; (b) the implementation of the first
            phase of the road maintenance program in Luzon island by:
            (i) the construction and enlargement of 5 base and 23 area
            workshops; (ii) procurement of road maintenance equipment
            including spares, hand tools, workshop tools and machinery;
            (iii) procurement of spares and components for existing
            equipment; and (iv) restoration of deteriorated sections of
            national road network to a maintainable condition as
            provided for in the first two years of a Five Year
            Restoration Program; and (c) technical assistance.
